long_description: Descriptions of trails, lakes, ridges and summits, and expanded info on access roads, land managers, trail conditions. Davis, Mel and John Veranth. Softcover; 162 pages; photos and maps. University Utah Press; copyright 1999. Complete rewriting of long out-of-print guide to Utah's High Uinta Wilderness and surrounding area.
short_description: Descriptions of trails, lakes, ridges and summits, and expanded info on access roads, land managers, trail conditions.
